alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, northeastern Gadsden, northwestern Jefferson, Leon, southern Grady and southwestern Thomas Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 349 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Havana to Florida A And M to near Crawfordville. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Tallahassee, Havana, Cairo, Crawfordville, Thomasville, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Cody, Shadeville, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee and Iamonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
